game.name: XRoar
game.desc: XRoar emulates the Dragon 32/64; Tandy Colour Computers 1, 2 and 3; the Tandy MC-10; and some other similar machines or clones. Put coco bios .rom files in bios folder and rom files (.dmk, .jvc, .dsk, .vdk, .bin, .sna, .hex, .cas, .rom, .ccc, .wav) in roms folder or created desired subfolder inside roms folder.
